document_data.name: Lathander's Red
document_data.mainbody: '''Lathander's Red''' was a variety of [[wine]] brewed by the [[priest]]s of [[Lathander]] in [[Dagger Falls]].
document_data.Description: A valuable red wine, it was typically kept in small casks below [[Lathander's Light]].
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1359}}, the temple of Lathander's Light was burnt down by [[Eragyn|Eragyn the Dark]]. Despite this, many casks of Lathander's Red survived the fire because they were stored in the wine cellar below ground.
